requests.name: OAuth Token Request
requests.description:
This is the first request sent to PayPal before doing anything else.

Ref: https://developer.paypal.com/webapps/developer/docs/api/#authentication--headers
requests.headers:
Accept: application/json
Accept-Language: en_US
PayPal-Request-Id: {{paypal-request-id}}
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Authorization: Basic <GENERATE THIS PART USING THE "BASIC AUTH" TAB>
